<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|string|type}}: The type of the float provider. One of <code>constant</code>, <code>uniform</code>, <code>clamped_normal</code>, or <code>trapezoid</code>.
**; If <code>type</code> is <code>constant</code>, additional fields are as follows<nowiki>:</nowiki>
** {{nbt|float|value}}: The constant value to use.
**; If <code>type</code> is <code>uniform</code>, additional fields are as follows<nowiki>:</nowiki>
** {{nbt|float|min_inclusive}}: The minimum possible value (inclusive).
** {{nbt|float|max_exclusive}}: The maximum possible value (exclusive). Must be larger than {{nbt|float|min_inclusive}}.
**; If <code>type</code> is <code>clamped_normal</code>, additional fields are as follows<nowiki>:</nowiki>
** {{nbt|float|mean}}: The mean.
** {{nbt|float|deviation}}: The deviation.
** {{nbt|float|min}}: The minimum value to clamp to.
** {{nbt|float|max}}: The maximum value to clamp to. Must be larger than {{nbt|float|min}}.
**; If <code>type</code> is <code>trapezoid</code>, additional fields are as follows<nowiki>:</nowiki>
** {{nbt|float|min}}: The minimum value.
** {{nbt|float|max}}: The maximum value. Must be larger than {{nbt|float|min}}.
** {{nbt|float|plateau}}: The range in the middle of the trapezoid distribution that has a uniform distribution. Must be less than or equal to <code>max - min</code>
</onlyinclude></div>
